HAEB POLICT STATEMENT
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters is composed of institutions*
groups* and individuals who believe in and support education* and are dedicated
to the use of the broadcast media in the effort to raise the educational and cul¬
tural level of American society0
As educators who broadcast they:
!• Acknowledge the necessity of both authenticity and responsibility in the
use of the broadcast media,,
2o Provide leadership in all areas of educational broadcasting*
3. Support and protect the rights of educational broadcasters*
k* Interpret the role of educational radio and -television broadcasting
and encourage its support*
5* Participate in developing* producing, distributing* and utilizing quality
programs*
6* Experiment with new program ideas and techniques*
7« Provide consultant service in areas of management* philosophy* program¬
ming* engineering, legal problems* licensing* and coordinate informa¬
tion exchange in these areas*
8* Encourage research as an aid to better broadcasting*
9* Promote the professional advancement of radio and television personnel
through:
a* Fellowships and scholarships*
b* Professional workshops and seminars*
c* Internships*
d* Establishment and encouragement of professional standards*
e* Consultation services to educational stations by teams of experts*
f* Operation of a placement service for educational television and radio

10* Cooperate with other institutions, organizations* and individuals in the
use of radio and television broadcasting in raising the general cultural
and educational level*
11* Foster international understanding through production and exchange of
radio and television programs*
